name: Authentic reviews and answers
title: Poor product, pathetic customer support
content: This headphone is worthless at any given price! I purchased it on 1st Jan 2021 and on 16th Jan 2021, it stopped turning on. I tried contacting the customer support over the call and email, but nothing worked. It give me hard days to reach to the customer support. Finally I got in touch with the customer support team. They don't have any service center and you need to ship the product to their warehouse. I did ship which costed me INR 160/-. Then it took multiple followups and 3 weeks to get the replacement. The customer support team also informed now it won't get replaced. That means, if the product stops working now (even in the warranty period) I need to throw it in dustbin since no replacement is going to take place. At the end, the product costed me total 760 (600 for product and 160 for shipping). And if in case I need to get it repaired, I may need to do further expense of 160 again to ship. So at the end, you are not getting the product at 600 but more that that. Better to invest in good brand and purchase better headphone then keep wasting money.. -------. Just to add-on, the second headphone which I received are continuously getting disconnected while on call. So the money spent here was complete waste...

Mic sounds very much muffled.. ~ Build quality gets a 9/10 points. The wires, the neckband and the earphones itself feels quite well built and durable.. Overall nice product - if you are on a budget of under 500, go for it.

name: Rajneesh Malik
title: Too Early too less features
content: This product is very good in respect of Audio Input(speakers) and Output (Mic). With volume + and - buttons in the Headset, you can increase the volume beyond the capacity of the phone, which is Great! The Bass and Treble are unbelievable!. That being said, products like these (with wireless/Bluetooth) technology have a very big flaw in general. The Headsets capability of Auto-connecting to multiple devices is an "Evil" in disguise of a blessing. These devices randomly connect to other devices (or keep on trying to, that have Bluetooth in ON/Broadcast state) and create interference with the "Your" device and hence there is an issue with frequent disconnections and they randomly disconnect from the Original device they are supposed to remain connected with.. I have experienced this with my own pTRON Tangent lite Headset that I purchased recently, but had to return it back.. My house is amidst two Samsung Smart TVs & one Smartphone (next door neighbors) and the headset keeps on disconnecting from my Smartphone and constantly remains in search of other devices.. Furthermore, there is no way you can restrict your headset, forget restricting, you cannot even disable discovery mode or stop it from further searching; resulting to which you have to Re-connect it to Your device every time it is required to perform its role with YOUR devices - (and who would ask our neighbours to switch off their Bluetooth?!). In the context of Call Receiving, you will always find the call landing on your Phone instead of the Headset and you have to reach up to the phone to reconnect it - making this device useless.. There are no issues till the time you are talking or listening to music, but the moment you stop, it will disconnect!. The worse part is that it will show the status on the phone as Connected, except that there is no Voice (or sound or music) transfer.. I have read that Headsets at higher price end also have this disability but very less.. Bluetooth Headsets are a new concept (with almost all latest devices having Bluetooth) and thus the Headsets require little bit more configurational options in future.

name: Gazi
title: Deep  Bass & Crystal clear sound  Earphones
content: One of the best sound quality earphones these are. Its Built Quality, its design is very reliable.. Using it from 4 days and can feel the sound.. Crystal clear sound, noise cancellation does it works well. One of the lloving thing is its Basss Quality, Really these earphones users a deep bass which increases the Interest in listening music

name: Saubhik Banerjee
title: Quality headphone @ Rs 499 but not for music lovers
content: pTron Tangent Lite is a affordable quality headphone if you get it at a deal of Rs 500.. Built quality - is decent and doesn't look cheap.. The headphone fits well on your neck. The wires are flat and tangle free. The ear buds are ok and do not give you pain if you keep them in your ears for long. Ear buds are magnetic and attach to each other easily. The neckband is really light.. Battery - The headphone usually give you 5 to 6 years of playback or talk time once it is fully charged. It takes only 1.5 hours to charge the headphone.. Call quality- is good at this price point and you will not get much complaints from the other side about low voice or surrounding noise.. Sound quality - Here is where the headphone lacks. I found that I could not hear few YouTube videos clearly which I could hear properly when I changed to my two years old wireless headphone (only one side working). The bass or trebles would be hardly be noticeable while listening to songs. At even the highest volume, you would find it difficult to hear the beats properly.. Pros -. Ergonomic sporty design. Lightweight neckband. Magnetic earbuds. Twist & Flex design. Mic for hands-free calls. 6h battery (125 mAh). Cons-. Low sound volume. Terrible bass. If you are music lover you should not even think of buying this neckband. If the main purpose of buying a neckband is for calling and listening to videos or YouTube, you may buy Tangent Lite.

name: Chandan
title: Overall average quality

The charging port is tight and right next to where the wire goes into the plastic housing. When I was trying to take charger out, the wire itself came out from the plastic sides. The wires in the sides are kind of 'tucked in' rather than moulded, which I would have expected.

name: PRANAV A.
title: Received faulty products multiple times. Product returned. Waiting for refund.
content: I bought this product seeing reviews. This was my first time buying a pTron product. Terribly disappointed. A few concerns - the ear-plugs are of low quality, feel hard and can get uncomfortable with prolonged wear, the product itself is extremely light (flails in the wind, when I'm on the bike) and appears slightly flimsy i.e. I am a little concerned it might break if I'm not careful. Only time will tell, I'll update when I can. Overall great value for money...keep 'em coming

content: pTron Tangent Lite Hi-fi Sports wireless Neckband is awesome and best in this price segment.. Packaging :. The packing is perfect with earphones placed securely. The packing itself looks premium.. Box contents :. Neckband earphones, a small USB cable to chargel, warranty card(1year warry) and 2 pairs of extra ear tips(small and large).. First impression :. The earphones look very good and awesome.It feels very light in hands.The neck band is made of some soft kind of plastic which is very comfortable to wear. We get 1 multifunctional button (the middle one)which can be used to power on and power off.you can also attend the calls and end the calls by single pressing them,while playing music you can pause/play by single press.. content: I ordered this because i wanted to use it for calling and it absolutely served the purpose. Its battery is well enough to manage long calls and feels really comfortable.. Sound quality is good.. Bass is okay.. Build quality is okay.. Bluetooth range is good.. Transmission speed is good.. Price at what i bought this for is a but higher but a good to go headphone.

name: Sivaprasad G
title: Suspect product quality as it failed within 3 months
content: I am writing this review after usage of 3 months. One of the speaker stopped working now. Since the return windows has closed, I don't know what to do with this product. My earlier review : I used this headphone while watching tv. The connection holds good even if I move away from the tv / bluetooth transmitter by 9m. Only con I find for this device is that at times it may take little longer to synchronise with the transmitter , may be it is when my pc and wifi is on. Battery lasts for an average of five to five and a half hours. Overall this is a good product with decent performance.

name: Deb
title: It is only ok for simplest of applications
content: I purchased this headset at a very good price of 499. I needed a BT headset for my official skype meetings and this looked like a good low cost option to me.. After going through 2 iterations of this product (1st was replaced) I am constrained to say it is better to avoid this unless of course your requirements are only limited to taking phone calls on the mobile.. Positives first.... * Is very cost effective. * Comes ready to use, right off the bat; no hassles pairing, pre-charged. * Very thoughtfully provides you an additional pair of those silicon/rubber ear muffs (whatever they are called) for the buds. So what's wrong? Pretty much everything else. Here's my take.... * Has 0 bass and sometimes sounds pretty tiny/hollow. * Has inconsistent quality. The first set will not work properly (wont carry my voice on a call) whether paired to a laptop or a phone. Had to return for a replacement. * Second one could pair and work with the phone. However quality of sound was debatable. Definitely not for listening to music. * Biggest challenge was with my laptop and skype calls. This was the whole reason for buying this device. My tech support team spent much time to figure out the issue. While it paired with the laptop initially the mic will not work at all. Later they figured out the sound coming through the mic was so low that the laptop was not detecting the input and switching over to the laptop mic. So even after they forced the laptop to only use only headset mic the person at the other end just could not hear almost anything! It was almost as if the mic was covered by something!. Net bottomline... This headset is of barely any use unless you need a headset on a low budget and your only expectation is to make phone calls. Otherwise just AVOID!!!. Footnote: I wonder what those 37% people who gave it 5 star rating were really smoking! Or was theire expectation so low that a mere pairing of the headset with their phone made them so gleeful... will never know!

name: Gayatri Iyer
title: Poor service
content: Good and speedy delivery from Amazon.. Sound quality - 3.5/5. Noise Cancellation - 4/5. Bass quality - 3.5/5. The headphones are good and okay in the particular prize range.. But this bluetooth works good with phones and doesn't work that well with laptop/computer.. The Bluetooth disconnects frequently with laptop and sometimes the mic doesn't works in the laptop.. I have requested for a replacement for which the warranty team are very poor in helping and providing support.. So if you are looking for a headphones which will be used with your laptop also, please don't buy this.

Sweat or water will not damage this headset, also it is lightweight so we can use it while jogging or at gym.. 1 year warranty for this price is also attractive.. Used more than one week continuously, not faced ear pain from wearing earphones.. Noise cancelation is also perfect, Tried it in outside.

name: Divy Daraniya

content: Ptron Tangent Lite is really an awesome bluetooth headphone. It provides user-friendly experience by high bass sound, high range, strong connectivity, easy buttons operation and lightweight structure. In addition, noise cancellation feature really enhances the quality of sound during phone calls or meetings. The magnetic earbuds remain stick together and avoid swinging here and there, therefore user doesn't even feel the presence of the headphones in the neck. A product is provided with enough battery backup, providing 6 hours of playback time. And last but not least, in this price range 1 year warranty is provided which makes the all in one package.

The sound quality and bass are so much better than those of this price range.. almost as good as boat.! The noise cancellation works well and power backup is too good.. The only con is that sometimes the person on other end of the call has trouble hearing u. But otherwise it's a very good product for workout & to simply get lost in music. !. Awesome for this price range. Well done pTron.!

name: Calorie Calling
title: Best Bluetooth Earphones in this range
content: Ptron Wireless Bluetooth Earphones are really great and is a value for money. The sound & bass quality are really good . Easy to wear and looks stylish , apart from it it has a great battery life too which last around 5-6 hours of daily use and charges it up in 2-3 hours.

name: Yatharth Joshi
title: Good battery backup!
content: This bluetooth earphone is amazing. The battery life is pretty decent(atleast 6 hours of continuous playback). Earphone comes with magnetic earbuds. I must say, they are very flexible and lightweight. Sound quality is perfect with a marvelous bass. It has bluetooth version v5.0 . Packaging was good. Got it delivered within 3-4 working days. pTron providing good budget friendly products to us. Definitely recommended.

name: Bhavesh bhirange
title: Perfect in all

Noise cancellation while calling is so damn accurate, and it has one feature of google assistance which i like the most it help while driving without any disturbance and is so accurate.. i like this product. Its so easy to use and fast for pairing i recommend to all that if u want this kinda features pls go ahead for dis.. u will never ever regret . As per my experience in office gym my sport partner with good battery backup..

name: AMULYA R.
title: very low backup, after 1 month connectivity issue

But the battery is not long enough, needs frequent charging. rest build quality it satisfactory.. the biggest disappointment is its connectivity. its frustrating when disconnects on its own.

name: Musa

name: Tarun Bansal
title: Better backup battery

An amazing product that has given me the privilege of not bothering to carry my phone in hands all the time while on call, listening music, watching videos etc.

name: Mayur Patel
title: Helpful reviews for new buyer
content: I purchased this product by too many compareing similar products, reviews, warranty and feature but i get not as expected i want so i written review so it will helpful to other. Packing like brand but quality is too lower grade. Material and wire not expected also shown in purchase window. On 1st time pairing and 1st song i noticed that one side sounds low and Check by my other family members and confirmed it's definitely problem in my product. Warranty card missing. Product prize on box show is 1899rs who write this amount for this class product qualitie.. If you find this review helpfull than you should write always review for that products which you got unexpected, damage, not ok,etc...

name: Simran
title: Sound quality is not that good
content: Bass is bad. It would have random audio cracks, at 2 feet range, which really hurt my ears. Its range is from 20Hz to 15kHz not till 20kHz which is human hearing range. It always has a range problem and would work around 22 feet in house cause of wall and other stuff. I'm not able to enjoy my music to the fullest. I enjoy it more with my cheap 100 INR wired earphones. I would say not to buy this, and if you still wanna, you can. After all, there is that 7-day replacement polity of theirs. Another thing, what is this Stand in the image that I have attached to this review. There is no place in the manual where it is mentioned. Please add this to the manual/website, cause I am not 100% sure how to use it. Maybe you just stick it to the wall and hang the headphones there, but I think it will just slide off with the slightest disturbance.

name: namrata
title: Good1
content: My need for the wireless neckband started a few months ago when all of us started working from home due to the lockdown and finding it hard to concentrate on my work.. Even though the market had many wireless earphones but the pTron Tangent Lite wireless neckband was exactly what I was looking for.. With its sheer sound quality and natural sounding warm bass feature, it gives high levels of detail. Just not for my interior use, it has also provided ease for my walks. The unique design, and negligible weight of the product is one of the best features. It suffices my needs and is highly recommended and easy on the pocket competing with other high end brands quality.
